EmailTemplate.subject: Here's the download you requested.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading Hello {{lead.First Name}},
Click the button to download your “Nokia Threat Intelligence 2019” report.
If you would like to view the “Malware in IoT, Crypto-coins & Smart Devices - prevention and appropriate action” webinar recording, click here <[[https://pages.nokia.com/T003CF-Threat-Intelligence-On-Demand-Webinar-ThankYouPage.html?utm_campaign=threatintelligence18&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email]]>. DOWNLOAD THE REPORT <[[https://{{my.AssetURL}}?did=d0000000016z&utm_campaign=threatintelligence18&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=report&utm_term=awareness]]> © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
